function getCookie( name ) {
   var start = document.cookie.indexOf(name+"=");
   var len = start+name.length+1;
   if ((!start) && (name != document.cookie.substring(0,name.length))) return(null);

<script type="text/javascript"> 
function getUrlVars() {
    var vars = {};
    var parts = window.location.href.replace(/[?&]+([^=&]+)=([^&]*)/gi,    
    function(m,key,value) {
      vars[key] = value;
    });
    return vars;
}
  
 
var path = location.pathname.toLowerCase();
if (path.match("/b2c/i/pages/default.aspx")) {
	var google_tag_params = { 
	  travel_pagetype: 'home'	  
	}; 
}
else if (path.match("lista_crociere")) {
	//recupero i primi 3 cruise id
	var cruiseCode =  Array();
	$(".cruise-fares-params").each(function(a,b){
	  if(a>2){
	   return false;
	  }
	  else{
	   cruiseCode.push($(b).attr("cruise-code"));
	  }
	});

	
	var regex = /((([0-9]){6})_)?([0-9]{6})\.html$/;
	var match = path.match(regex);
	if (typeof match[1] !== "undefined" ){
	 var startdate = match[2];
	 var enddate = match[4];
	}else{
	 var startdate = match[4];
	 var enddate = match[4];
	}
	//recupero primo giorno del mese e ultimo giorno
	startdate = startdate[0]+startdate[1]+startdate[2]+startdate[3]+"-"+startdate[4]+startdate[5]+"-01";

	var lastDayOfMonth = new Date(enddate[0]+enddate[1]+enddate[2]+enddate[3], enddate[4]+enddate[5], 0);
	enddate = ""+lastDayOfMonth.getFullYear()+"-"+("0" + (lastDayOfMonth.getMonth() + 1)).slice(-2)+"-"+lastDayOfMonth.getDate();
	
	
	var google_tag_params = { 
		travel_destid: cruiseCode, 
		travel_startdate: startdate, 
		travel_enddate: enddate,
		travel_pagetype: 'searchresults'
	}; 
}else if (path.match("pages/bookingdefinition.aspx")) {
	var cruiseId = getUrlVars()["Cru"];
	startdate = "20"+cruiseId[4]+cruiseId[5]+"-"+cruiseId[6]+cruiseId[7]+"-"+cruiseId[8]+cruiseId[9];
	var daysCroisieres = ""+cruiseId[2]+cruiseId[3]+"";
	var lastDay = new Date(startdate);
		lastDay = lastDay.setDate(lastDay.getDate() + parseInt(daysCroisieres));
		lastDay = new Date(lastDay);
	var enddate = ""+lastDay.getFullYear()+"-"+("0" + (lastDay.getMonth() + 1)).slice(-2)+"-"+("0" + (lastDay.getDate())).slice(-2);
	var price = $(".departure-starting-price span.departure-value").text();
	if (price != "") price = price.trim().replace(".","").replace(",",".");
	
	var google_tag_params = {
		travel_destid: cruiseId, 
		travel_startdate: startdate, 
		travel_enddate: enddate,
		travel_pagetype: 'offerdetail',
		travel_totalvalue: parseInt(price)
	};
}else if ((path.match("/pages/ticketsinfo.aspx"))||(path.match("/pages/optioninfocommitv4.aspx"))) {
	var cruiseId = getUrlVars()["Cru"];
	startdate = "20"+cruiseId[4]+cruiseId[5]+"-"+cruiseId[6]+cruiseId[7]+"-"+cruiseId[8]+cruiseId[9];
	var daysCroisieres = ""+cruiseId[2]+cruiseId[3]+"";
	var lastDay = new Date(startdate);
		lastDay = lastDay.setDate(lastDay.getDate() + parseInt(daysCroisieres));
		lastDay = new Date(lastDay);
	var enddate = ""+lastDay.getFullYear()+"-"+("0" + (lastDay.getMonth() + 1)).slice(-2)+"-"+("0" + (lastDay.getDate())).slice(-2);
	var price = $(".basket_totalprice > span").text().replace(" ","").replace(".","").replace(",",".");
	
	var google_tag_params = {
		travel_destid: cruiseId,
		travel_startdate: startdate,
		travel_enddate: enddate,
		travel_pagetype: 'conversionintent',
		travel_totalvalue: parseInt(price)
	};
}


</script>
